page.title: 20FINAL OVERALL VIEW OF ASHILL
page.content: {Ashill}being a typical Norfolk village is basically self sufficient with its varied retail outlets including a butchers, frozen food shop, general stores, farm shop (selling milk), market garden and an electrical shop. A fresh fish van, fish and chip van, milk float, bakers van and mobile library visit the village regularly. In this project we have tried to portray Ashill as a lively and interesting village to live in as this is how we see ourselves. Parents "complain" of being taxi drivers for children and adults comment that they never have time to do all they wish. Two organisations not mentioned elsewhere are{The Royal British Legion branch and the{Village Trustees}that oversee the village green, pond and other legacies left to the village.
